ingredients: 1 pound pork loin, cut into 3-inch x 1/4-inch strips
16 ounces firm tofu, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
1 ounce (1/2 cup) enoki mushrooms, bottoms cuts
3/4 ounce (1/4 cup) wood ear mushrooms, thinly sliced
3/4 ounce (1/4 cup) shiitake mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste
1/4 cup cornstarch dissolved in 1/2 cup water
